Patricio Dalton, Associate Professor of Economics.

title: Welcome to the Dutch Development Economics Network (DUDE)
text:
Welcome to the Dutch Development Economics Network (DUDE)
Our mission is to facilitate knowledge exchange and connections among development economists based in the Netherlands. Our members are researchers from seven participating universities: Groningen, Nijmegen, Tilburg, UNU-MERIT, Utrecht, VU Amsterdam, and Wageningen. We organize two annual Events: a general workshop and a workshop dedicated to PhD students. We are also affiliated to the European Development Economics Group.







    


⏸️ ▶️







Images are all publicly shared from past events.










Join us!

 Connect with researchers in the Netherlands working on Development Economics. Seven participating universities in the Netherlands take turns hosting engaging events where we share knowledge and new ideas in the field of Development Economics.


Upcoming events



3rd PhD Workshop, fall 2025, Tinbergen Institute


15th Workshop, spring 2026, Nijmegen University



Recent events



14th Workshop, 27–28 March 2025, Tinbergen Institute


2nd PhD Workshop, 24–25 October 2024, Wageningen University
